meanings.definition: Whosesoever: belonging to or possessed by any person or persons whatsoever.
meanings.sent1: Whosesoever can use this pen if they need it.
meanings.sent2: The book belongs to whosesoever finds it first.
meanings.sent3: Whosesoever took my sandwich from the fridge, please return it!
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest is guarded by a dragon, whosesoever dares to approach.
meanings.sent5: Whosesoever holds the key to the mystery will unlock great secrets.

meanings.definition: Whosesoever: of or belonging to whomsoever.
meanings.sent1: Whosesoever is welcome to join us for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: The prize will go to whosesoever completes the challenge first.
meanings.sent3: Whosesoever left their umbrella in the office, it's raining outside!
meanings.sent4: The crown will be bestowed upon whosesoever proves their loyalty.
meanings.sent5: Whosesoever possesses the ancient amulet will have great power.
